verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) <S%H7227>"Many<s%> <S%H7227>times<s%> they have <S%H6887>persecuted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> up," Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%>
<S%H7227>"Many<s%> <S%H7227>times<s%> they have <S%H6887>persecuted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> up; <S%H1571>Yet<s%> they have not <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against me.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> He has <S%H7112>cut<s%> in <S%H7112>two<s%> the <S%H5688>cords<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
Let them be like <S%H2682>grass<s%> upon the <S%H1406>housetops,<s%> <S%H7945>Which<s%> <S%H3001>withers<s%> <S%H6927>before<s%> it <S%H8025>grows<s%> up;
With <S%H7945>which<s%> the <S%H7114>reaper<s%> does not <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H3709>hand,<s%> Or the <S%H6014>binder<s%> of <S%H6014>sheaves<s%> his <S%H2683>bosom;<s%>

<S%H3808>Nor<s%> do those who <S%H5674>pass<s%> by <S%H559>say,<s%> "The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be upon you; We <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
